description: [FRAMESTING](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1120) is a web shell capable of enabling arbitrary command execution on compromised Ivanti Connect Secure VPNs.(Citation: Mandiant Cutting Edge Part 2 January 2024)

external_references.description: Lin, M. et al. (2024, January 31). Cutting Edge, Part 2: Investigating Ivanti Connect Secure VPN Zero-Day Exploitation. Retrieved February 27, 2024.
